A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed the movie.  It was entertaining\, and overall was an excellent addition to the cinematic Star Wars cannon.  My one complaint is with the ending.  While I don't want to spoil it for others\, I will say that the outcome of a major character's story arc was poorly explained\, ill advised\, and it took me out of the story.    Had it not been for that\, this would have been a 4.5 star movie.
